iFixit | Software Engineer | Onsite, San Luis Obispo, California

iFixit is to empowering the world to fix everything they own, one device at a time. Our software team makes it easy to for anyone to learn how to repair, and connects people with the information, tools, and parts they need to fix anything. We have a modern stack, a caring work environment, and great work / life balance.
